42 #define GRPC_RETURN_NOT_OK(s) \
43  do { \
44  ::arrow::Status _s = (s); \
45  if (ARROW_PREDICT_FALSE(!_s.ok())) { \
46  return ::arrow::flight::internal::ToGrpcStatus(_s); \
47  } \
48  } while (0)
